title: Male mice hard-wired to recognize sex of other mice

title_detail.value: Male mice hard-wired to recognize sex of other mice

summary: A male mouse identifies the sex of an unfamiliar mouse because of hard-wired brain physiology, not previous experience, investigators have found.

summary_detail.value: A male mouse identifies the sex of an unfamiliar mouse because of hard-wired brain physiology, not previous experience, investigators have found.
